file.name: paybc-1.0.0.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
  info:
    title: PayBC API Reference
    description: PayBC API reference documentation
    version: 1.0.0
  paths:
    /paybc-service/api/refund:
        post:
          tags:
          - Refund Service
          summary: Refund a transaction
          description: Refunds can take around seven business days to reflect on your
            customer's credit card statement, the timing depends on the cardholder's financial
            institution and isn't within PayBC's control
          operationId: refundUsingPOST
          requestBody:
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/RefundRequest"
          responses:
            '200':
              description: OK
              content:
                application/json:
                  schema:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/RefundResponse"
                  examples:
                    '1234567890':
                      value:
                        id: '10006713'
                        approved: 1
                        amount: 101
                        message: 'Approved'
                        created: '2022-08-17T11:51:41.000+00:00'
                        orderNumber: '19979'
                        txnNumber: 'REGT00005433'
            '201':
              description: Created
            '401':
              description: Unauthorized
            '403':
              description: Forbidden
            '404':
              description: Not Found
    /paybc-service/oauth/token/:
      get:
        tags:
        - Token Service
        summary: Fetch a token
        description: Credentials should be passed in the form of 'Basic {encoded credentials}
          to get a token which will be used as Bearer token in other end points
        operationId: getTokenUsingGET
        parameters:
        - name: Basic-Token
          in: header
          description: Basic-Token
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        responses:
          '200':
            description: OK
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/TokenResponse"
          '401':
            description: Unauthorized
          '403':
            description: Forbidden
          '404':
            description: Not Found
    '/paybc/payment/{paybc_ref_number}/{transaction_number}':
      get:
        tags:
          - PayBC get transaction
        summary: ayBC get transaction
        description: ayBC get transaction.
        operationId: PAYBC_GET_TXN
        parameters:
          - name: paybc_ref_number
            in: path
            description: PayBC Ref Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
          - name: transaction_number
            in: path
            description: Transaction Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
        responses:
          '200':
            description: Success
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Cont'
                examples:
                  '1234567890':
                    value:
                      pbcrefnumber: '10007'
                      trnnumber: '1'
                      trndate: '2020-08-10'
                      description: Direct_Sale
                      trnamount: '50.0'
                      paymentmethod: CC
                      currency: CAD
                      gldate: '2020-08-10'
                      paymentstatus: PAID
                      trnorderid: '1003558'
                      paymentauthcode: TEST
                      cardtype: VI
                      revenue:
                        - linenumber: '1'
                          revenueaccount: 112.32562.20245.4378.3212319.000000.0000
                          revenueamount: '20'
                          glstatus: PAID
                          glerrormessage: null
                        - linenumber: '2'
                          revenueaccount: 112.32562.20245.4378.3212319.000000.0000
                          revenueamount: '30'
                          glstatus: PAID
                          glerrormessage: null
          '400':
            description: BadRequest
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
      parameters:
        - name: paybc_ref_number
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
          examples:
            '1234567890':
              value: 10006
        - name: transaction_number
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
          examples:
            '1234567890':
              value: 1234567890
    '/cfs/parties/{party_number}/accs/{account_number}/sites/{site_number}/conts/{contact_number}':
      put:
        tags:
          - Conts
        summary: Update Conts
        description: Updates a contact record.
        operationId: Conts_PUT
        parameters:
          - name: party_number
            in: path
            description: Party Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
          - name: account_number
            in: path
            description: Account Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
          - name: site_number
            in: path
            description: Site Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
          - name: contact_number
            in: path
            description: Contact Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
        requestBody:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Cont'
          required: true
        responses:
          '200':
            description: Updated
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Cont'
                examples:
                  cont_info3:
                    value: '{"contact_number":"1003","party_number":"11111","account_number":"4101","site_number":"29921","full_name":"contact-full","first_name":"TEST","middle_name":null,"last_name":"TEST","phone_number":"1111111111","email_address":null,"provider":"Finance and Citizens Services","links":[{"rel":"collection","href":"https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/"},{"rel":"parent","href":"https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/"},{"rel":"self","href":"https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/1003/ "}]}'
                  cont_info2:
                    value: '{"contact_number":"1002","party_number":"11111","account_number":"4101","site_number":"29921","full_name":"contact-full","first_name":"TEST","middle_name":null,"last_name":"TEST","phone_number":"1111111111","email_address":null,"provider":"Finance and Citizens Services","links":[{"rel":"collection","href":"https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/"},{"rel":"parent","href":"https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/"},{"rel":"self","href":"https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/1002/ "}]}'
                  cont_info1:
                    value: '{"contact_number":"1001","party_number":"11111","account_number":"4101","site_number":"29921","full_name":"contact-full","first_name":"TEST","middle_name":null,"last_name":"TEST","phone_number":"1111111111","email_address":null,"provider":"Finance and Citizens Services","links":[{"rel":"collection","href":"https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/"},{"rel":"parent","href":"https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/"},{"rel":"self","href":"https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/1001/ "}]}'
          '400':
            description: BadRequest
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
      get:
        tags:
          - Conts
        summary: Get Cont
        description: Retrieve contact record.
        operationId: Cont_GET
        parameters:
          - name: party_number
            in: path
            description: Party Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
          - name: account_number
            in: path
            description: Account Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
          - name: site_number
            in: path
            description: Site Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
          - name: contact_number
            in: path
            description: Contact Number.
            required: true
            schema:
              type: string
        responses:
          '200':
            description: Success
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Cont'
                examples:
                  cont_info3:
                    value:
                      contact_number: '1003'
                      party_number: '11111'
                      account_number: '4101'
                      site_number: '29921'
                      full_name: contact-full
                      first_name: TEST
                      middle_name: null
                      last_name: TEST
                      phone_number: '1111111111'
                      email_address: null

                        - rel: collection
                          href: 'https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/'
                        - rel: parent

                        - rel: self
                          href: 'https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/1003/ '
                  cont_info2:
                    value:
                      contact_number: '1002'
                      party_number: '11111'
                      account_number: '4101'
                      site_number: '29921'
                      full_name: contact-full
                      first_name: TEST
                      middle_name: null
                      last_name: TEST
                      phone_number: '1111111111'
                      email_address: null
                      provider: Finance and Citizens Services
                      links:
                        - rel: collection
                          href: 'https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/'
                        - rel: parent
                          href: 'https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/'
                        - rel: self
                          href: 'https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/1002/ '
                  cont_info1:
                    value:
                      contact_number: '1001'
                      party_number: '11111'
                      account_number: '4101'
                      site_number: '29921'
                      full_name: contact-full
                      first_name: TEST
                      middle_name: null
                      last_name: TEST
                      phone_number: '1111111111'
                      email_address: null
                      provider: Finance and Citizens Services
                      links:
                        - rel: collection
                          href: 'https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/conts/'
                        - rel: parent
                          href: 'https://heineken.cas.gov.bc.ca:7019/ords/cas/cfs/parties/11111/accs/4101/sites/29921/'
                        - rel: self

          '400':

              application/json:

      parameters:
        - name: party_number
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
          examples:
            cont_info1:
              value: 11111
            cont_info2:
              value: 11111
            cont_info3:
              value: 11111
        - name: account_number
          in: path

            format: string

    '/cfs/parties/{party_number}/accs/{account_number}/sites/{site_number}/invs/{invoice_number}/adjs/':
      post:

    '/cfs/parties/{party_number}/accs/{account_number}/sites/{site_number}/rcpts/{receipt_number}/unapply':
      post:
        tags:
          - Rcpts Unapply
        summary: Unapply Rcpt
        description: Unapply a receipt.
        operationId: Rcpts_Unapply_POST
        requestBody:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/invoice_info'
          required: true
        responses:
          '200':
            description: Created
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Rcpt'
                examples:
                  rcpt_info:
                    value:
                      receipt_number: '123451'
                      receipt_date: '2021-10-05T07'
                      party_number: '11111'
                      party_name: receipt
                      account_number: '4101'
                      site_number: '29921'
                      receipt_amount: 10.02
                      unapplied_amount: 10.02
                      payment_method: credit card
                      comments: This is post
                      invoices:
                        - invoice_number: '10021'
                          amount_applied: '9.85'
                          lines:
                            - line_number: '23'
                              amount_to_apply: $9.5
          '400':
            description: BadRequest
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
      parameters:
        - name: party_number
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            format: string
            type: string
          examples:
            inv_info1:
              value: 11111
            inv_info2:
              value: 11111
            inv_info3:
              value: 11111
        - name: account_number
          in: path
          required: true

          required: true

            format: string
            type: string
          examples:
            inv_info1:
              value: 10021
            inv_info2:
              value: 10022
            inv_info3:
              value: 10023

    /cfs/validatepayins/:
      post:
        tags:
          - Bank Validation
        summary: Bank Validation Endpoint
        description: Validates bank info.
        operationId: Bank_validation_POST
        requestBody:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Bank_info'
          required: true
        responses:
          '200':
            description: Created
            content:
              application/json:
                examples:
                  '1234567':
                    value:
                      bank_number: '0001'
                      bank_name: BANK OF MONTREAL
                      branch_number: '00720'
                      transit_address: 'DATA CENTRE,PRINCE ANDREW CENTRE,,DON MILLS,ON,M3C 2H4'
                      account_number: '1234567'
                      CAS-Returned-Messages: VALID
                  '12345678':
                    value:
                      bank_number: '0002'
                      bank_name: ''
                      branch_number: '00720'
                      transit_address: ''
                      account_number: '1234567'
                      CAS-Returned-Messages: 0001 - Bank Number is Invalid.
                  '123456789':
                    value:
                      bank_number: '0003'
                      bank_name: ''
                      branch_number: '00720'
                      transit_address: ''
                      account_number: '1234567'
                      CAS-Returned-Messages: 0003 - Account number has invalid characters.0005 - Account number has non-numeric characters.0006 - Account number length is not valid for this bank.
          '400':
            description: BadRequest
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
    '/cfs/parties/{party_number}/accs/{account_number}/sites/{site_number}/rcpts/':
      post:
        tags:
          - Rcpts
        summary: Create Rcpt
        description: Creates a receipt.
        operationId: Rcpts_POST
        requestBody:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Rcpt'
          required: true
        responses:
          '200':
            description: Created
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Rcpt'
                examples:
                  rcpt_info:
                    value:
                      receipt_number: '123451'
                      party_number: '11111'
                      party_name: receipt
                      account_number: '4101'
                      site_number: '29921'
                      receipt_date: 01-02-2019
                      receipt_amount: 10.02
                      unapplied_amount: 10.02
                      payment_method: credit card
                      comments: This is post
                      invoices:
                        - invoice_number: '10021'
                          amount_applied: '9.85'
                          lines:
                            - line_number: '23'
                              amount_to_apply: $9.5
          '400':
            description: BadRequest
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
      get:
        tags:
          - Rcpts
        summary: GET Rcpts
        description: Gets all receipts.
        operationId: Rcpts_GET
        responses:
          '200':
            description: OK
            content:
              application/json:
                schema:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Rcpt'
                examples:
                  rcpts:
                    value:
